title: Big Brother Canada ends season early due to COVID-19 developments - CBC.ca
description: Big Brother Canada ends season early due to COVID-19 developments CBC.ca ‘Big Brother Canada’ officially ending Season 8, ceasing production due to coronavirus Global News Big Brother Canada Season 8 suspends production Toronto Sun Big Brother Canada season c…
content: Just over a week after announcing production was still underway on Big Brother Canada despite the global COVID crisis producers now say the reality series has ended early Global and Insight Productions say production on season is now done in light of chars
